card.name: Cathartic Reunion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.

card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance
card.text: +1: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent. +1: Add {R}{R}. −3: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

card.name: Fiery Confluence
card.text: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature. • Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Past in Flames
card.text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pyroblast
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell if it's blue. • Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

card.name: Pyromancer Ascension
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Rite of Flame
card.text: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.
